name: Minesweeper
description: A simple Minesweeper game written in Elm.

name: Elm Games
description: A collection of mini games written in Elm, currently Minesweeper and Tic-Tac-Toe.

name: Massive Decks
description: A Cards Against Humanity clone written in Elm and Scala.

name: elm-flatris
description: Tetris game, a clone of Flatris with Elm.

name: Sliding Puzzle
description: Sliding puzzle game, configurable via URL.

name: MMP Halloween Text Adventure
description: A text-adventure game based on Midnight Murder Party where the challenge was to use Elm for everything (and to implement a Native module if otherwise impossible). Played with Task-based Native modules for audio and DOM scrolling.

name: html-to-elm
description: Online tool for converting HTML to elm-html

name: elmchat
description: Websocket-based chat application with Elm, Phoenix, Elixir, and Javascript

name: Mantl UI
description: A quick view into Mantl's health checking and services

name: elm-hedley
description: Elm web app with Headless Drupal backend

name: elm-lang.org
description: Official Elm website, built using Elm

name: package.elm-lang.org
description: Website for browsing Elm packages and exploring documentation
